ThingDef.label: thunder warrior genetic matrix
ThingDef.description:
Genetic matrix is a bio-mechanical construct that encodes key genetic modifications, providing the necessary instructions for stable mutations and enhancements. It is used in a Gene-seed Gestator as a template for creation of the Ascendance Vials.

This genetic matrix contains the template for making Thunder Warriors.

Rapidly deteriorates outside containment.

ThingDef.label: firstborn genetic matrix
ThingDef.description:
Genetic matrix is a bio-mechanical construct that encodes key genetic modifications, providing the necessary instructions for stable mutations and enhancements. It is used in a Gene-seed Gestator as a template for creation of the Ascendance Vials.

This genetic matrix contains the template for making Firstborn marines.

It seems that this template has room for additions.

Rapidly deteriorates outside containment.
